chapters.desc: Caption: “Central America seethes with the struggle for power, land and food … under the ever-present gaze of the United States.” Montage of stills of soldiers and peasants, troops in cities, civilians being stopped, young recruits, corpses, a funeral, political leaders, children, political slogans, people comforting each other, religious processions, etc. I.D.CARD MIKE GOLDWATER To communicate, photographs must reach the emotions. Credits.
